11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"The Messenger of Allah married me in Shawwal, and he took up residence with me in Shawwal

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَوْقَاتِ الَّتِي يُسْتَحَبُّ فِيهَا النِّكَاحُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Times In Which Marriage Is Recommended
